page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: The local area is well served by a flourishing{Rugby team}in both of the villages. The team within the Garnant area do not have their meeting place within the given block but in a public house to the East of the block. They do however play their home games within the block. The Rugby Club in Brynamman is an {important centre}for local{social {groups. }It also houses a squash court complex. Often at weekends local people meet at the Rugby Club in the evenings and the main cultural passtime on such evenings is a sing song with{traditional Welsh songs being sung. There is also a large gardening society within the area.
